alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette; Henry (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 3:44PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockdale, southern DeKalb, northeastern Fayette, central Henry and Clayton Counties through 415 PM EST ... At 344 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Panthersville to near Fayetteville, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Fayetteville, Conyers, Jonesboro, Stockbridge, Forest Park, Riverdale, Morrow, Lovejoy, Lake City, Lithonia, Lakeview Estates, Candler-Mcafee, Lake Spivey, Rex, Belmont, Arabia Mountain, Big Haynes Creek Park, Hidden Valley Park, and Jw Smith Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
